instruction: Patient reports missing a dose of warfarin last week; daughter created a pill organizer and now helps maintain adherence. Daughter also drives patient to frequent INR checks. Patient expresses concern about INR values but denies any unusual bruising or bleeding.

attributes.narrative: Missed one dose of warfarin last week; daughter has set up a pill organizer, helps maintain adherence, and drives patient to frequent INR checks. Patient is concerned about INR values but denies any unusual bruising or bleeding.
